mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase ( user_id, product_no, payment_method, card_type, last_four_digits, purchase_date, price ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productNo}, #{paymentMethod}, #{cardType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastFourDigits, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{price} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.purchase_no, p.user_id, p.product_no, p.payment_method, p.card_type, p.last_four_digits, p.purchase_date, p.price, pro.product_title, pro.period FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN product pro ON p.product_no = pro.product_no WHERE p.purchase_no = #{purchaseNo}

SELECT p.purchase_no, p.user_id, p.product_no, p.payment_method, p.card_type, p.last_four_digits, p.purchase_date, p.price, pro.product_title, pro.period FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN product pro ON p.product_no = pro.product_no WHERE p.user_id = #{searchKeyword} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchase WHERE user_id = #{searchKeyword} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
